title: of that section as they relate to the State bodies to which the following order
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order allows for meetings to be held remotely by local authorities. Any 
decision made or vote taken or other act done at such a meeting shall be as good 
and effectual as a decision made or vote taken or other act done by the members 
concerned would have been if such a meeting had been held in person. 

The arrangements that apply for the regulation of meetings are matters for 
members to determine subject to the provisions of Part 6 and Schedule 10 of the 
Local Government Act 2001. 

The local authorities established at the time of the making of this Order are – 

Carlow County Council 

Limerick City and County Council 

Cavan County Council 

Longford County Council 

Clare County Council 

Louth County Council 

Cork City Council 

Mayo County Council 

Cork County Council 

Meath County Council 

Donegal County Council 

Monaghan County Council 

Dublin City Council 

Offaly County Council 

Dun Laoghaire-Rathdown County 
Council 

Roscommon County Council 

Fingal County Council 

Sligo County Council 

Galway City Council 

South Dublin County Council 

Galway County Council 

Tipperary County Council 

Kerry County Council 

Waterford City and County Council 

Kildare County Council 

Westmeath County Council 

Kilkenny County Council 

Wexford County Council 

Laois County Council 

Wicklow County Council 

Leitrim County Council
